```{r}
settings = c("setting1", "setting2")
missing_rates = c("miss50", "miss30")
J = 3
n.vector = c(300, 1000)
```

```{r}
summarize_all_settings_with_all_missing_rates(settings = settings,
                                              missing_rates = missing_rates,

                                              J = J,
                                              n.vector = n.vector,

                                              version = "test2",
                                              is.original = FALSE)
```
